div.head: 諸血
div.div: all types of blood; all types of bleeding

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all types of blood; all types of bleeding

sense.def: ① Pharmaceutical Substance Combined Designation of blood liquid of all types of animals. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry zhu xue 諸血： 諸血，味甘，平。主補人身血不足 , “ All types of blood : the flavor is sweet, [qi] is balanced. They control supplementing insufficiency of blood in a person’s body”.

② Pathological Condition Combined Designation mainly of all types of bleeding conditions, sometimes also of extravascular stagnant blood conditions. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 15: “ 產後諸血，漏下赤白 , “ All types of bleeding after delivery, (i.e.) a leaking of red-white [liquid]”.
